meanings.definition: A set of changes made to improve the appearance or function of something.
meanings.sent1: The makeovers on the old house made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys watching home makeover shows on TV.
meanings.sent3: The makeovers on the playground equipment made the kids very happy.
meanings.sent4: The makeover of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The makeovers on the website attracted more visitors.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a new and improved appearance to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity's makeover for the movie premiere was stunning.
meanings.sent2: She decided to give her room a makeover with new furniture.
meanings.sent3: The makeover of the school mascot costume was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: The makeover of the car made it shine like a new penny.
meanings.sent5: The makeover of the store's layout increased sales.
